paper.title: Scheduling a steel plant with timed automata
paper.venue: Embedded and Real-Time Computing Systems and Applications
paper.abstract: Scheduling in an environment with constraints of many different types is known to be a hard problem. We tackle this problem for an integrated steel plant in Ghent, Belgium, using UPPAAL, a model checker for networks of timed automata. We show how to translate schedulability to reachability, enabling us to use UPPAALu0027s model checking algorithms.
